notice.author: Philipp Grozinger
notice.title: Formulate v0.1.1-alpha
notice.text: The first instalment brings the encrypted login, the navigation bar, the noticeboard, the version log and a page building framework. The version log and the noticeboard both use the same XML database framework as introduced in Pharmadmin v0.8.0. The login script uses encryption and an SQL database to make the system very safe.
